scripts.smoke: rimraf allure-results && (npx playwright test ./tests/TORQ/01_SmokeTest.spec.js || echo "Tests failed") && npx allure serve allure-results
scripts.account: rimraf allure-results && (npx playwright test ./tests/TORQ/Account.spec.js || echo "Tests failed") && npx allure serve allure-results
scripts.io: rimraf allure-results && (npx playwright test ./tests/TORQ/IO_COM.spec.js || echo "Tests failed") && npx allure serve allure-results
